data: When the accident happened, Cordova was singing the mad scene in Lucia for the last time in that season, and she had never sung it better.
When the accident happened, Cordova was singing the mad scene in _Lucia_ for the last time in that season, and she had never sung it better.

The Primadonna
A Sequel to "Fair Margaret"
